definition[0]: to be in a particular situation, state, or place after a series of events, especially when you did not plan it
example[0]: He came round for a coffee and we ended up having a meal together.
example[1]: I wondered where the pictures would end up after the auction.
example[2]: Most slimmers end up putting weight back on.
example[3]: Anyone who swims in the river could end up with a nasty stomach upset.
example[4]: He could end up as president.
example[5]: I donâ€™t want to end up like my parents.
